intro.content: You put our other cooks to shame! They're finally here, which means you can finish the session with word board karate!

I'll hold the boards up. If the word on the board starts with the "W" sound, like whale, say "Wham!" If the word starts with the "H" sound, like hat, say Haa!" If the word starts the "P", like pepper, say "Pow!" If the starts with "B" like bongo, say "Bam!"
Wham, Haa, Pow and Bam! Ready, go!

If the word on the board starts with the W sound, like whale, say Wham! If the word starts with the H sound, like hat, say Haa! If the word starts the P, like pepper, say Pow! If the starts with B like bongo, say Bam! If the word starts with S like soup, say SLAM!
Wham, Haa, Pow, Bam and Slam! Ready, go!
